citations.desc: Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 2:04 pm on 26-OCT-
2023. The inspector called the Licensee and they said they were not available for inspection.
End Section

narrative:
2.126(b) 
   
Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries. 
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 2:04 pm on 26-OCT-
2023. The inspector called the Licensee and they said they were not available for inspection. 
 
 
End Section
